Uses of Class
fish.payara.micro.PayaraMicro

    • Uses of PayaraMicro in fish.payara.micro

      Methods in fish.payara.micro that return PayaraMicro 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.addDeployFromGAV(String GAV)
      Adds a Maven GAV coordinate to the list of archives to be deployed at boot.
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.addDeployment(String pathToWar)
      Adds an archive to the list of archives to be deployed at boot.
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.addDeploymentFile(File file)
      Adds an archive to the list of archives to be deployed at boot.
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.addRepoUrl(String... URLs)
      Adds a Maven repository to the list of repositories to search for artifacts in
      static PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.getInstance()
      Obtains the static singleton instance of the Payara Micro Server.
      static PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.getInstance(boolean create) 
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.setAlternateDomainXML(File alternateDomainXML)
      Sets the path to a domain.xml file PayaraMicro should use to boot.
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.setApplicationDomainXML(String domainXml)
      Sets an application specific domain.xml file that is embedded on the classpath of your application.
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.setAutoBindRange(int autoBindRange)
      Sets the maximum number of ports to check if free for autobinding purposes
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.setClusterMulticastGroup(String hzMulticastGroup)
      Sets the cluster group used for Payara Micro clustering used for cluster communications and discovery.
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.setClusterPort(int hzPort)
      Sets the multicast group used for Payara Micro clustering used for cluster communication and discovery.
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.setClusterStartPort(int hzStartPort)
      Sets the start port number for the Payara Micro to listen on for cluster communications.
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.setDeploymentDir(File deploymentRoot)
      Sets a directory to scan for archives to deploy on boot.
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.setHttpAutoBind(boolean httpAutoBind)
      Enables or disables autobinding of the HTTP port
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.setHttpPort(int httpPort)
      Sets the port used for HTTP requests
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.setHzClusterName(String hzClusterName)
      Sets the name of the Hazelcast cluster group
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.setHzClusterPassword(String hzClusterPassword)
      Sets the Hazelcast cluster group password.
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.setInstanceName(String instanceName)
      Sets the logical instance name for this PayaraMicro server within the server cluster If this is not set a UUID is generated
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.setLite(boolean liteMember)
      Sets the lite status of this cluster member.
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.setLogoFile(String filePath)
      Sets the path to the logo file printed at boot.
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.setLogPropertiesFile(File fileName)
      Set user defined properties file for logging
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.setMaxHttpThreads(int maxHttpThreads)
      The maximum threads in the HTTP(S) threadpool processing HTTP(S) requests.
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.setMinHttpThreads(int minHttpThreads)
      The minimum number of threads in the HTTP(S) threadpool Default value is 10
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.setNoCluster(boolean noCluster)
      Enables or disables clustering before bootstrap
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.setPrintLogo(boolean generate)
      Set whether the logo should be generated on boot
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.setRootDir(File rootDir)
      Sets the File path to a directory PayaraMicro should use to install its configuration files.
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.setSslAutoBind(boolean sslAutoBind)
      Enables or disables autobinding of the HTTPS port
      PayaraMicro PayaraMicro.setSslPort(int sslPort)
